note.p: Bank clerk. Honorary librarian of the Epping Forest and County of Essex Naturalists’ Field Club (from 1885, Essex Field Club).
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/1728/18/36)
Manchester, England, non-conformist births and baptisms, 1758–1912 (Ancestry.com, accessed 19 January 2021)
Transactions of the Epping Forest and County of Essex Naturalists’ Field Club 2 (1881–2): 194
